nodes.documentation:
@author Nikola Madjarevic
Created at 1/15/19
nodes.name: TwoKeyAcquisitionLogicHandler

nodes.documentation:
@notice Function to activate campaign, can be called only ONCE
@dev onlyContractor can call this function
nodes.name: activateCampaign
checkAllRequirementsForConversionAndTotalRaised

nodes.documentation:
@notice Function which will validate if conversion can be created if endCampaignWhenHardCapReached is selected
@param campaignRaisedIncludingConversion is how much will be total campaign raised with new conversion
nodes.name: canConversionBeCreatedInTermsOfHardCap

nodes.documentation: @notice Function to check if campaign has ended
nodes.name: isCampaignEnded

nodes.documentation: @notice Function to check if contractor can withdraw unsold tokens
nodes.name: canContractorWithdrawUnsoldTokens
getInvestmentRules
getEstimatedTokenAmount

nodes.documentation:
@notice Get all constants from the contract
@return all constants from the contract
nodes.name: getConstantInfo

nodes.documentation: @notice Function to fetch stats for the address
nodes.name: getAddressStatistic
